name: Waking up at 1 p.m. on a sunny sunday afternoon
name_original: Waking up at 1 p.m. on a sunny sunday afternoon
description:
"Waking up at 1 p.m. on a sunny sunday afternoon" is an interactive recreation of a summer emotion. Setting

It is a warm summer sunday. You are in your bed, half asleep. Nothing planned for today, so you can stay in bed for as long as you want. The sun is pouring in through your window, you can hear that your flatmates are already awake.

What happened last night is not important, maybe you can't even remember it right now. What is important is that you are here, about to start a new day at your own pace.

Features
  • Explore the flatshare-room of a sleepy twenty-something
  • Soak up the cozy summer atmosphere
  • Play with sophisticated ragdoll- and cloth-physics
  • No objectives to fulfill, so take your time
Credits

A game by Arno Justus
Music: "Quiet Today"  by Josh Armistead

Thank you for playing!
